data.text: @nypost Only if he could put the same efforts to solving the attacks, rape and robbery in the five boroughs and the subway system ... What do you say @NYCMayor he doesn't need another cheerleader

@nypost He’s been playing everywhere else except in NYC. What has happened as a result of him playing in other arenas? NYC wants a penalty paid & the amount that NYC will lose for not having a championship run will cost much more than a token penalty for an unvaccinated Kyrie. Shameful.
@nypost How about doing something about the sky rocketing crime @NYCMayor
@nypost Special treatment!?!?  Other players on other teams can play at Barclays BUT Kyrie cant…  seems like a scumbag move 😒
@nypost Politicians should NEVER have to power to take our jobs away if we refused a medical procedure. Even saying it out loud it sounds ridiculous. It's shameful what NYC has become.

@nypost Kyrie can attend a Nets game while unvaccinated. 

Kyrie cannot play in a Nets game while being unvaccinated. https://t.co/njfleCbkSH
@nypost Oh, Adams will find away. He doesn't care about the good, hard-working people he put out of work.
@nypost Let's not forget these tyrants and their mandates come election time.
